value.stringValue: Use this Flow to quickly reset Demo Scenarios

fields.name: Employee_Services_Reset_BDT
fields.fieldText:
This flow will perform the following:


  • Reset Profile Image.
  • Reset Employee Information to match Demo Setup.
  • Delete Existing Telework Agreements.
  • Reset Any Potential PAR Name Changes.
  • Reset Any Potential PAR Duty Location Changes.
  • Delete any Employee Relation Cases.

fields.name: Employee_Services_Reset_BDTU
fields.fieldText:
Affected Contact:

﻿{!Get_Contact_Record.Name}/ {!Get_Contact_Record.Id}

fields.name: Employee_Services_Reset_NextDT
fields.fieldText: To proceed, click "Next".

value.stringValue: Use this Flow to quickly reset your Demos

fields.name: Error_Screen_DT
fields.fieldText: There is an issue with the Demo Setup Record. Please make sure that the record has at least an associated Applicant and Contact Record.

value.stringValue: Use this Flow to quickly reset Demo Scenarios

fields.name: Hiring_Reset_BDT
fields.fieldText:
This flow will perform the following changes:

  • Runs Employee Services Reset
  • Runs Onboarding Reset
  • Runs Suitability Reset
  • Makes sure a Recruit Exists (If not, creates a new one from Demo Setup)
  • Updates Applicant Data from the Recruit.
  • Deletes any Interviews.
  • Resets Recruit Questions.
  • Resets any Medical, Fitness, Background, Polygraph status for the Applicant.
  • Ensure Correct Job Opening is referenced in Applicant Record.
  • Deletes any Applicant Tasks.

fields.name: Hiring_Reset_BDTU
fields.fieldText:
Affected Applicant:

{!Get_Applicant_Record.Name}/ {!Get_Applicant_Record.Id}

Affected Contact:

{!Get_Contact_Record.Name}/ {!Get_Contact_Record.Id}

fields.name: Hiring_Reset_NextDT
fields.fieldText: To proceed, click "Next".

value.stringValue: Use this Flow to quickly reset Demo Scenarios

fields.name: Onboarding_Reset_BDT
fields.fieldText:
This flow will perform the following changes:

  • Runs Employee Services Reset
  • Marks Applicant record as "Closed - Offer Accepted"
  • Delete any cases, performance plans, tasks, events, assets, course enrollments, Earnings and Leave Statements. This includes anything that may be in the "Employee Services" Demo Scenario.
  • Resets Contact Info to New-Hire Info.

fields.name: Onboarding_Reset_BDTU
fields.fieldText:
Affected Applicant:

{!Get_Applicant_Record.Name}/ {!Get_Applicant_Record.Id}

Affected Contact:

{!Get_Contact_Record.Name}/ {!Get_Contact_Record.Id}

fields.name: Onboarding_Reset_NextDT
fields.fieldText: To proceed, click "Next".

value.stringValue: Use this Flow to quickly reset Demo Scenarios

fields.name: Recruiting_Reset_BDT
fields.fieldText:
This flow will perform the following changes:

  • Runs Employee Services Reset
  • Runs Onboarding Reset
  • Runs Suitability Reset
  • Runs Hiring Reset
  • Deletes any Recruits matching the Demo Setup Record Recruit Email Address.
  • Deletes Recruit Questions.
  • Resets any Medical, Fitness, Background, Polygraph status for the Applicant.

fields.name: Recruiting_Reset_BDTU
fields.fieldText:
Affected Recruit:

{!Get_Recruit_Record.Name} / {!Get_Recruit_Record.Id}

Affected Applicant:

{!Get_Applicant_Record.Name}/ {!Get_Applicant_Record.Id}

Affected Contact:

{!Get_Contact_Record.Name}/ {!Get_Contact_Record.Id}

fields.name: Recruiting_Reset_NextDT
fields.fieldText: To proceed, click "Next".

fields.name: Scenario_Select_Screen_NextDT
fields.fieldText:
REMEMBER: You cannot reset it to a phase later than it currently is and expect great results. When in doubt, reset all the way and work the record to where you want it.


﻿To proceed, click "Next".

fields.name: Suitability_Reset_BDT
fields.fieldText:
This flow will perform the following changes:

  • Runs Employee Services Reset
  • Runs Onboarding Reset
  • Sets Applicant Stage at "Background Investigation"
  • Resets Contact Employment Status to Inactive.
  • Set contact as a "Inactive"
  • Deletes any non-Suitability related Tasks on Applicant.

fields.name: Suitability_Reset_BDTU
fields.fieldText:
Affected Applicant:

{!Get_Applicant_Record.Name}/ {!Get_Applicant_Record.Id}

{!Get_Contact_Record.Name}/ {!Get_Contact_Record.Id}
